title: pilot-select component click not updating selection
description:
The pilot-select component is not properly updating the selected options when clicked. 

**Expected Behavior:**
- Clicking an option should update the selection state
- The trigger text should display the selected value(s)
- Change event should be dispatched
- For single-select: dropdown should close
- For multi-select: checkmarks should appear and selected tags should display

**Actual Behavior:**
- Clicking options does not update the selection
- The component appears unresponsive to clicks

**Steps to Reproduce:**
1. Open demo.html in browser
2. Navigate to Select Components section
3. Click on any option in the dropdown
4. Observe that selection does not update

**Component Location:**
- File: design-system/components/select.js
- Custom Element: <pilot-select>

**Previous Attempt:**
A fix was applied to change _parseOptions() to query light DOM directly instead of using slot.assignedElements(), but the issue persists.

**Priority:** High - This is a core form component that is currently non-functional
close_reason: Fixed: The dropdown was closing synchronously in _selectOption(), destroying the shadow DOM before the click event could complete. Deferred the close with setTimeout to allow the event to finish processing.

title: Split components.js into individual files
description:
Split the monolithic components.js file (2069 lines, 15 components) into a modular directory structure with individual component files.

## Requirements
- Create design-system/components/ directory
- Extract each component to its own file:
  - button.js (PilotButton)
  - input.js (PilotInput) 
  - card.js (PilotCard)
  - badge.js (PilotBadge)
  - terminal.js (PilotTerminal)
  - label.js (PilotLabel)
  - divider.js (PilotDivider)
  - grid.js (PilotGrid)
  - panel.js (PilotPanel)
  - status.js (PilotStatus)
  - code-block.js (PilotCodeBlock)
  - annotation.js (PilotAnnotation)
  - measurement.js (PilotMeasurement)
  - modal.js (PilotModal)
- Create index.js as main entry point with all exports
- Extract shared utilities to shared.js module:
  - baseStyles
  - createStyles function
  - generateId function
- Update demo.html to use new entry point
- Maintain backward compatibility with existing exports

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All 15 components moved to individual files
- [ ] Shared utilities extracted to shared module
- [ ] index.js exports all components correctly
- [ ] demo.html updated and working
- [ ] No breaking changes to existing imports
- [ ] File structure follows project conventions
